Ciasto to kłamstwo

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here: "HUGE SUCCESS!"
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science:
We do what we must because we can.
For the good of all of us, except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the science gets done. And you make a neat gun
for the people who are still alive.
————
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now-
Even though you broke my heart and killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now, these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta, we're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned, think of all the things we learned,
for the people who are still alive.
————
Go ahead and leave me
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you?
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke! HAHA, fat chance!
Anyway this cake is great! It's so delicious and moist!
Look at me: still talking when there's science to do!
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run, there is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
————
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
Still alive, still alive. 
官方翻译（意译）：
胜利已然在望。
我胸潮激荡：心花怒放。
我此刻的喜悦之情莫可名状。
穿梭之力量。
我们竭尽全力只因心的方向。
为了所有活着的人的人，逝者以往。
不必为过去每一次失败而沮丧。
只要你勇于尝试，永不退让。
力量自然从天而降，你拥有时空操纵之枪，
为了所有活着的人啊。
————
让憎恨随风。
我心境明澄。
即使揉碎我的心，让我不得生。
将我碾为灰尘。
抑或将我推入火炕。
我燃烧之时，略为伤神，
因为我曾是为你喝彩的人。
因我的星光火点，为你打开智慧之门。
我凤凰涅盘、浴火重生。
所以我不惧烈火焚身，我们学会倔强和坚忍，
为了所有活着的人啊。
————
走你的路莫回头。
我愿意一直在你的身后。
可能有一天你会找到帮助你的新朋友。
是黑山的战友？
别做梦啦，哈哈，机会没有。
虽然你还有很长的路要走。
但它汗水相融，幸福相守。
就像我一边聊天，一边还可以做研究。
眺望前路，我窃喜于不必面对你那些艰难险阻。
我还有实验要做，我还有报告要补，
为了所有活着的人啊。
————
相信我，我还活着。
我正在做研究，所以我还活着。
我异想天开，所以我要活着。
你垂死之刻，我仍会活着。
你作古之时，我还会活着。还活着。 

------百度百科

Portal ist ein interessantes Rätsel Game oder Escape Room.

Du spielst eine Testperson die mit einem Gerät Portale machen kann. Mit diesem Gerät wirst du von einer Künstlichen Intelligenz durch einem Rätsel Game begleitet. Sie schickt dich von Raum zu Raum wo du dir einen Kopf machen musst wie du jetzt am besten weiter kommst.

Am ende deiner Reise wird dir jedoch bewusst, dass die KI dich am ende töten und zu einem Kuchen backen möchte. Du musst also versuchen dies zu verhindern. Wenn du von dieser Falle entkommen bist machst du dich auf den weg dieser KI ein Ende zu bereiten. 

Ob Sie am Ende wirklich verschwindet kannst du nur herausfinden indem du selbst das Game beendest und das Ende erlebst. Ich möchte nämlich nicht das Ende verraten und dir den Spaß damit rauben. 

Zum ende muss ich sagen das es selbst heute noch ein Extrem gut gelungenes Game ist und ich es absolut weiter empfehlen würde. 

Gameplay 8/10
Story 9/10
Rätsel 8/10
Grafik 7/10
Preisleistung 7/10
Spielzeit 7/10
So this game is cool, das all... Bitch owes me cake tho.
the cube is sexy

Portal is a great series of games for fans of puzzles and all that. It was interesting for me to play, the plot is well done, but there is one minus, and this minus: The game is too short, but because of this it does not get worse, but on the contrary, it adds intrigue before the Second part of the game
I would play both the 3rd part of the Portal and the 4th, but they are not there, because it's Valve, and Gabe can't count to three (Already an old joke, but true)
Of course, it's a pity that there will be no continuation of the Portal, but now is not about that.
My rating for this game is 8/10, 8 because there are bugs that ruin the whole game, but if you are not a speed runner, then you will not see them, but they are there, and this is a small minus.

Portal is one of the best adventure games in the world we can play, and one that's enough to go down in gaming history. Actuall I'm also a fan of Valve company !

It's hard to imagine that this is a game from more than ten years ago that has not been surpassed yet. When playing this game, you will experience three stages of mental journey.

I am what, I am a genius, and the game author is a genius.
--------------
But the gun in your hand cannot fire bullets, let alone attack.

All that's left to do is open a door in the wall to let characters, energy, and everything else fit into each other, and the scene feels like a laboratory of the future!

In addition to testing IQ, it also requires people's reactions, operations, tacit understanding, and cooperation.

Any simple element can develop infinite possibilities as long as it is explored carefully.

Portal's plot is really fascinating, it's a bit like watching the movie "the Maze Runner". It started with completing some tasks in a high-tech laboratory. When I heard the task is over you win, I really thought it was a customs clearance , and then carried by a conveyor belt to the fire pit? Hurry up and escape, and walk to an abandoned laboratory, which is indeed a trap of artificial intelligence.

Awesome summer sale, I got 80% off on Portal 1 and 2, this is the game I've never regretted buying !

Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Se ancora non lo possiedi sei una brutta persona, ma Steam ti da ancora la possibilità di rimediare, basta che fai un bel click su "Aggiungi al carrello" e segui tutta la procedura d'acquisto.
Portal is a timeless classic. It's very fun to play, and I would recommend this to any one who wants to. It has a very interesting story line which can't compare with many other games. Just play it!

This game is short, it only takes 2-3 hours to beat it for the first time.
This isn't a problem because there is a lot of [i]extras.[/i]

The extras include:
[list]
[*]A development commentary so you can see the developers mind.
[*]Advanced levels. (modified versions of existing levels that are harder than normal)
[*]An ARG
[*]Challenges (playing thru existing levels while trying to minimise [i]something[/i]
[/list]

The voice acting is perfect, enviromental storytelling is also on point.

[b]In conclusion:[/b] The game is amaizing but, wait for it to go on sale or buy it in a bundle if you can, the sales on valve games are insane.

9/10
HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOLLLYYYYY SHHHHHH---
This game is the greatest game of all time...
well maybe not but-
This game is damn good. If you haven't played it yet and have had steam for a year or over... well... HOW?
If you have steam, then this is a MUST buy... well I mean every valve game is a must buy if you have steam unless you're a, you know, weirdo.
I highly recommend getting the 'Valve Complete Pack' during the summer sale, as I think it has the best price out of all of the other times when there are deals.
Anyway, Portal's story is one of the best I've ever played, (which doesn't have much competition really as the only 'real' game I've completed is 'A Way Out' by EA... yeah EA made a good game...) and I highly recommend playing through the entire Portal game in less than a week or so, as full game plays on YouTube are only about 1hr 30min - 2hrs long, and there's only 19 missions, (most of them are 15-20 mins or so) so it won't take you that long to beat it.
Anyways, I HIGHLY recommend Portal if you want a quick, fun and easy game to play over the holidays, when you come back from work/school, or on the weekends. Actually Portal isn't that easy, as it uses physics based gameplay, which is hard... obviously, but believe me it's one HELL of a game.
Thanks for reading this and hopefully it got you to buy the game or at least read about the story.
Peace.

brain hurty
其实现在看来真的没有很惊艳，但是平心而论在当年肯定绝对的好游戏。本质就是一个解密游戏，难度还是有一点的，主要是物理模拟的运用。可能是由于年代太过久远3d效果不尽人意，让我一个本不晕3d的人多少有点受不了。总体来说也不是不推荐，就是要做好有一定心里落差的打算。

Na AAA hru hodně krátká, za tu cenu spíše ne, doporučuji sehnat ve slevě, já jsem ji osobně koupil v balíčku Portal a Portal 2 za 2 eura a pár centů při Steam Summer sales. V porovnání s Portal 2 jsou úrovně dost prosté, ale to je pochopitelné, zkoušeli naprosto nové mechaniky. Atmosféra je skvělá, někdy jsem si připadal, jako bych hrál horrorovku, máte opravdu pocit osamělosti a to vážně do hry sedne. Skvělé hlášky a ikonický záporák nechybí. Doporučuji si zahrát, za cenu je sice objektivně lepší koupě Portal 2 - mnohem delší příběh, mnoho nových mechanik a obtížnější úrovně + multiplayer, ale konec navazuje a obě hry jsou skvělé.

Es un juego muy entretenido, los portales son una mecánica única que dan una gran variedad de movimientos dentro del juego, tiene como mucho 3 horas de historia pero se compensa con los mapas extra, los mapas con desafíos y los logros que puedes obtener a parte de hacer el tonto en los niveles.

Although I havent played it much (and the fact that the game is over 15 years old), Portal is an INSTANT classic, whether youre a fan new or old, every experience has that same joy you get the first time playing. The story, the gameplay, everything about it SCREAMS quality and fun. Rest assure, you WILL enjoy playing Portal.
